description:
In this course we will explore:

  • The motivations behind why people want to have their own business.
  • Some of the common traits that successful small business owners share.
  • The importance of having support mechanisms, especially of a spouse / significant other and family.
  • Why it’s essential to “know thyself” and what you are bringing to the table.
  • Where you can look for ideas for a business.
  • The two kinds of business “owners” --- entrepreneurs and operators / managers --- and why it’s important to know which one you are.
  • The many different ways you can “own” a business.
title: So You Want To Have Your Own Business
